pr_title: ground items: add support for quantity thresholds

timeline.message:
ground items: add support for quantity thresholds

Adds the ability to use `<` and `>` when configuring highlighted or hidden drops.

replies.bodyText: I guess i combined them because they held approximately the same information, except that the configs had the inequality information. But i can see how it's odd and will split them up so that it'll look better.
replies.author: dekvall
